function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Low electricity score 17%","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High overall impact scores 72-80%","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Positive impact criteria in building domains may lead to increased human traffic and interaction, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low scores in electricity, domestic hot water, and dynamic envelope domains may lead to compromised living conditions, increasing the risk of illness and disease.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low ventilation and heating scores in the building domains","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low electricity domain score 17%","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low electricity domain score due to absence of onsite electricity generation and storage","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low domestic hot water and dynamic envelope scores","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Absence of occupancy detection or motion sensors, and daylight sensors for lighting domain","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low level of control functionalities in the majority of domains","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Building lighting control is absent","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"No daylight or motion sensors implemented in rooms","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of reported information on ev charging capability may lead to unmonitored and unregulated usage, increasing the risk of contagious disease spread through surface contact on ev charging stations.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Partial building fault detection process may result in undetected issues with hvac systems, leading to poor indoor air quality and increased risk of airborne disease transmission.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to simultaneously heat and cool rooms may lead to inconsistent temperature control, creating discomfort for occupants and potentially impacting their immune response, thereby increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of automatic operable windows or skylights","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited reporting of window and skylight position","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of smart windows","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of temperature control in individual rooms","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient coverage of relevant heating loads by meters","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of domestic hot water storage and control","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient local electricity production and storage for ev charging","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Simultaneous heating and cooling limitations","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of smart grid integration","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and airflow control leading to poor air quality and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective control of lighting systems leading to inadequate visibility and potential safety hazards.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inefficient cooling system maintenance leading to poor temperature control and potential discomfort for consumption.","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Less than 50% of relevant electricity loads are metered, leading to poor visibility and control over electricity consumption.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of control over thermal exchanges and absence of fault-detection and diagnostics platform pose risks for maintaining indoor air quality and temperature regulation.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of individual room control for cooling may lead to uneven temperature distribution and poor ventilation in certain areas, increasing the risk of airborne disease transmission.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on manual transmission.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of reported thermal energy storage tes","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Less inaccurate building maps and characteristics","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Collection of information involves interacting with building staff and users, increasing
